content: अपनयनं {@--1@} Taking away, removing, extracting &c.; गंडस्वेद° <ls>Me. 26</ls>; नातिश्रमापनयनाय <ls>Ś. 5. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Healing, destroying, curing (disease &c.); रोगाच्चापनयने <ls>P. V. 4. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Discharge or acquittance of a debt or obligation. {@--4@} Subtraction, deduction.
